mutants.original_line: preferred_sweetness = [s+p for s, p in zip(sweetness, preference)]
mutants.mutated_line: preferred_sweetness = [s - p for (s, p) in zip(sweetness, preference)]

mutants.original_line: preferred_sweetness = [s+p for s, p in zip(sweetness, preference)]
mutants.mutated_line: preferred_sweetness = [s * p for (s, p) in zip(sweetness, preference)]
